title: Article 10 - LOWER HUDSON RIVER DRAINAGE BASIN SERIES
content:
Article 10 - LOWER HUDSON RIVER DRAINAGE BASIN SERIES
State Regulations

Part 855 - RONDOUT RIVER, RONDOUT CREEK AND WALLKILL RIVER DRAINAGE BASIN (§ 855.1 to 855.6)

Part 856 - SPARKILL CREEK DRAINAGE BASIN (§ 856.1 to 856.7)

Part 857 - WAPPINGER CREEK DRAINAGE BASIN (§ 857.1 to 857.6)

Part 858 - LOWER HUDSON RIVER (MAIN STREAM) (§ 858.1 to 858.6)

Part 859 - SAW MILL RIVER DRAINAGE BASIN (§ 859.1 to 859.6)

Part 860 - RAMAPO RIVER AND MAHWAH RIVER DRAINAGE BASINS (§ 860.1 to 860.6)

Part 861 - LOWER ESOPUS CREEK DRAINAGE BASIN (§ 861.1 to 861.6)

Part 862 - DRAINAGE BASINS OF STREAMS ENTERING THE HUDSON RIVER IN ORANGE, ULSTER, DUTCHESS AND PUTNAM COUNTIES (§ 862.1 to 862.9)

Part 863 - DRAINAGE BASINS OF STREAMS ENTERING THE HUDSON RIVER IN ALBANY, COLUMBIA, GREENE AND RENSSELAER COUNTIES (§ 863.1 to 863.9)

Part 864 - LOWER HUDSON RIVER DRAINAGE BASIN FROM MOUTH TO NORTHERN WESTCHESTER-ROCKLAND COUNTY LINES (§ 864.1 to 864.9)

Part 865 - HACKENSACK RIVER-SADDLE RIVER AND GREENWOOD LAKE-STERLING LAKE DRAINAGE BASINS (§ 865.1 to 865.10)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
